title: How to Make Spicy Hot Dogs

steps.headline: Get your half cup of chopped onion and let that tenderizer in a tablespoon of oil.
Stir your  ketchup, pickle relish, sugar,  vinegar,  salt, and a dash of pepper.
Cut hotdogs lengthwise and add to sauce.
Simmer the hotdogs and mixture for about 10 minutes.
Serve on toasted buns with your choice of condiments, if desired.

text: Get your half cup of chopped onion and let that tenderizer in a tablespoon of oil.  Stir your  ketchup, pickle relish, sugar,  vinegar,  salt, and a dash of pepper.  Cut hotdogs lengthwise and add to sauce.  Simmer the hotdogs and mixture for about 10 minutes.  Serve on toasted buns with your choice of condiments, if desired.
